General.Name: Maple Peak Investments Inc
General.Description: Maple Peak Investments Inc. focuses on investing in casinos, gaming and game of chance, leisure and entertainment, and resort companies in Europe and the United States. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is headquartered in Richmond, Canada.
